articles.title: UN alarm as Ukraine nuclear power plant shelled again - BBC
articles.description: Ukraine and Russia trade blame as the Zaporizhzhia nuclear plant, Europe's largest, is hit.
articles.content:
More shelling of Ukraine's Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant has been reported, with Ukraine and Russia again blaming each other for the attack.
